channel.title: Shop.CFG (coords) PLZ HELP!
channel.description:
How do i find out the coords of a shop
theres alot of shops i cant find where do i find it on shops.cfg?
or is it on client.java?

item.title: Shop.CFG (coords) PLZ HELP!
item.dc:creator: @hyphy_ftw hyphy ftw
item.description:
@hyphy_ftw wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:2, topic:314974”]the shop id is at shop.cfg there can u deside if u can sell or buy and what items

at client.java u make it a shop just search zeke and copy that and make a new one at the bottom at the shops with your shopdid in

and there u place the shop is in autospawn.cfg just search for the cords of that shop[/quote]

Nonononononononono… he means he’s found in his Shops.cfg (or we) Shop = 32 or something like that, and he wants to find out where the shop it located not how to add one…

Read full topic

item.title: Shop.CFG (coords) PLZ HELP!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

the shop id is at shop.cfg there can u deside if u can sell or buy and what items

at client.java u make it a shop just search zeke and copy that and make a new one at the bottom at the shops with your shopdid in

and there u place the shop is in autospawn.cfg just search for the cords of that shop
